entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
